titleStmt.title: Signa coeli: the signs of heaven, or, A sermon on a text in the tenth chapter of the prophecy of the prophet Jeremiah, at the second verse preached on ... the nine and twentieth day of March ... 1652 ... by John Swan ...
titleStmt.author: Swan, John, d. 1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
